item.title: The Addams Family Ukulele Play Along - Key of Bb
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA Ukulele. Key of Bb.
Chords Used: Bb, Cm, F. Finger picking/TAB included.
As heard on The Addams Family
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE & Bass): https://youtu.be/jy5lUe66E-k
******************** Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion.
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher. If you don't have a podcast app, please check out Radio Public for all your podcasts--they support podcasters financially.
You are invited to visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (a free resource). Also on social media: Twitter (@UkeStuff) and Instagram (@ukestuff.info).

item.title: Steven Universe - We Are the Crystal Gems - Key of F, G
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA Ukulele. Keys of F & G.
Chords Used: F, A7, Bb, C, Bbm, Gm7, Am7, Bbm7, E7, Am, Dm, G, Cmaj7, D7, C7, B7, Cm, Em, Gmaj7
As performed on Steven Universe
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/pdzcOAduI8E
******************** Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion.

item.title: Scooby Doo Theme Song Ukulele Play Along (In A) - Key of A
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of A.
Chords Used: A, Bm, E, D, D#
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/R-w5qnNS0Uo
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6

item.title: Scooby Doo Theme Song Ukulele Play Along (In G) - Key of G
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of G.
Chords Used: G, Am, D, C, D#, D (alternate position)

item.title: Scooby Doo Theme Song Ukulele Play Along (In G) *Capo Required* - Key of A
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of A, but chords shown in G to be used with a Capo on the 2nd Fret.
Chords Used: G, Am, D, C, D#, D (alternate position)
Please put a capo on the second fret to play this version of the song!
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/R-w5qnNS0Uo
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6

item.title: Toon Tunes - The Flintstones - Key of C
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of C (Transposed down from the original).
Chords Used: G, C, Dm7, D7, G7, Dm, Em, F, E7, A7, Am7, Fm
The theme song from The Flintstones.
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/SxhKRWp3zx0

item.title: Mickey Mouse Ku’u Lei Melody Ukulele Play Along - Key of C
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of C. Transposed down a major third from the original. Suggestion: if you want to play along with the original song, consider using a capo at the 4th fret and using these chords.
Chords Used: C, Dm, G7, C7, F, Fm, A7, D7, E7
As heard in the Disney Short "Mickey Mouse Ku'u Lei Melody"
https://youtu.be/QDhdMF0qZI8
The song (PDF) was shared on social media by the composer (Christopher Willis) under the name "Pua Nani Ē."
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/A1OW_b1t3u0
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com.
Interested in UkeStuff merchandise? https://teespring.com/stores/ukestuff
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher.
And please visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (free).
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Time for a Tune Up (The Joy of Gone) Ukulele Play Along - Key of D, Dm
item.description:

item.title: Vince Guaraldi Trio - Linus and Lucy - Key of C
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Linus and Lucy on the ukulele by The Vince Guaraldi Trio. The chords used are C F G Cm. Original in Ab.
*This is an edited version that repeats the main theme and takes out the rest of the song. This is NOT the full version.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on the bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
